name: Standard Adrenaline Patch
description: A concentrated stim patch that resets stress pathways. Clears 1d4+1 Stress.

name: Armor Nanite Repair Kit
description: A swarm of nanites that reknit damaged armor plating. Spend any amount of Hope to clear that many Armor Slots.

name: Respirator Gel
description: A bio-gel that filters oxygen from water through skin membranes. Breathe underwater minutes equal to your level.

name: Data Clone Chip
description: A single-use microdrive that duplicates any stored data perfectly. After use, becomes inert silicon.

name: Precision Sync Plus
description: Optimized neural alignment implant granting +1 Finesse until next rest.

name: Instinct Amplifier Plus
description: Refined AI-tuned patch that grants +1 Instinct until next rest.

name: Persona Enhancement Plus
description: Improved pheromone mod granting +1 Presence until next rest.

name: Cognitive Overclock Plus
description: Advanced nootropic granting +1 Knowledge until next rest.

name: Phase-Shift Serum
description: A rare experimental serum that lets the user blink through space within very Far range.

name: Guaranteed Critical Algorithm
description: A microchip booster that ensures your next successful attack critically succeeds.

name: Hyper-Corrosive Edge Coating
description: A volatile toxin gel that adds 1d12 to your next physical damage roll.

name: Spell Cache Drive
description: A neural-linked data drive that lets you temporarily load and cast one stored spell, then offload it.

name: Arc Resonance Powder
description: Quantum dust that amplifies energy weapon output. Adds 1d12 to your next magic damage roll.

name: Wall-Melt Gel
description: An industrial solvent that dissolves barriers in bright flashes—stand clear.

name: Morale Beacon Flare
description: A short-range beacon that boosts allied morale. Allies in Close range roll d6 when spending Hope; on a 6, Hope isn’t spent.

name: Major Plasma Grenade
description: A heavy plasma cell delivering 4d20 plasma damage within Far range.

name: Grav-Damp Chip
description: A spinal implant chip that reduces gravitational pull, letting you fall slowly for minutes equal to your level.

name: Null-Field Generator
description: A portable field device that nullifies magic and digital resonance within Far range for one scene.

name: Quantum Flux Serum
description: A chaotic serum that triggers random recovery or visions of death. Roll d6 for varying effects.

name: Neural Toxin Ampule
description: A potent injectable that delivers 2d10 direct neural damage to a victim.

name: Major Health Stimpack
description: High-capacity stimpack restoring 1d4+2 HP.

name: Major Adrenaline Patch
description: Upgraded patch clearing 1d4+2 Stress.

name: Tracking Scrambler Mist
description: A chemical cloud that scrambles biosign and digital traces, preventing tracking until next rest.

name: Grav-Lift Harness
description: Deployable grav-wings granting flight for minutes equal to your level.

name: Sonic Disruption Jar
description: Releases a cacophony of ghostly feedback. All within Far range take 6d8 sonic damage.

name: Pyro-Core Injector
description: An internal reactor shot that lets you exhale plasma fire. Make an Instinct roll; targets in front take 2d20 physical damage.

name: Nanowire Bridge Pod
description: Deploys self-assembling nanowires forming a bridge up to Far range; dissolves after short rest.

name: Deep-Sleep Capsule
description: A sedative capsule inducing full rest and clearing all Stress on waking.

name: Executive Feast Pack
description: A luxury nutrient kit that clears all HP and Stress and grants 1d4 Hope.

name: Industrial Adhesive Gel
description: A dual-compound resin that permanently bonds objects together.

name: Micro-Size Serum
description: A nanite serum halving your body size with +2 Agility and –1 Proficiency until reverted.

name: Macro-Size Serum
description: A nanite expansion serum doubling your size with +2 Strength and +1 Proficiency until reverted.

name: Memory Transfer Crystal
description: Upon death, stores your last loadout data. An ally can absorb it, inheriting one of your cards before it dissolves.

name: Soothing Med-Gel
description: A rest-time gel that clears 1d10 HP or 1d10 Stress when applied.

name: Flashbang Grenade
description: A high-intensity flash device blinding all targets within Close range until they take HP damage.

name: Assassin’s Neurotoxin
description: A lethal nanopoison: if you crit before your next long rest, your target dies. Fail—and so do you.

name: Reactive Deflection Matrix
description: A single-use energy field that negates one instance of damage when Hope is spent, then shatters.

name: Orbital Strike Beacon
description: A miniaturized satellite uplink calling down a storm of kinetic rods. Deals 8d20 physical damage within Very Far range.
